timeline.message:
More Efficient Blobstore Metdata Writing

No need to copy all these bytes multiple times, especially not when
writing a multiple MB global cluster state snapshot through this method.

timeline.bodyText: ByteBuffersDataInput throws if passed an empty list of buffers so we need this special case handling to throw consistent exceptions when the checksum fails because a blob was truncated to empty for some reason.
